question: 祭日
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>day</kanji> you have a <kanji>festival</kanji> is a <vocabulary>national holiday</vocabulary>. That way everyone can come to celebrate without worrying about going to school or work. This is also known as a <vocabulary>festival day</vocabulary> (pretty obvious, right?).
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
